goals.active: Report back to the Durmand Priory.
goals.complete: I reported back to headquarters and was promoted to Magister. Gixx has a small job for us nextâ€”to retrieve some research papers from his colleague, Maeva, in Lion's Arch.

goals.active: Run Gixx's errand in Lion's Arch.
goals.complete: On entering Maeva's house, we discovered it had been torn apart by a monstrous scout from Orr. Sieran and I are headed to Claw Island, to warn the Lionguard.
